credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Traveling cutlery case
description: Box for three implements, follows the shape of a spoon. Lid attached to bottom with two small hinges on back small hooks and rings on front side. Top of lid stamped leather with gold; an urn with flowers in the centre, a laurel wreath and chains on each side, flowers, grapes and pears along the sides. Inside of box covered with green wool fabric.
name: Traveling cutlery case
